BKA' STZAL NAS, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BYAMS PA
DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'

SEMS DPA' CHEN PO LHAG MA DE DAG DANG, TSE DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYOR
DANG, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RADVA TI'I BU DANG, TSE DANG LDAN PA
MO'U DGAL GYI BU CHEN PO DANG, TSE DANG LDAN PA BYAMS


@460A *, ,MA'I BU GANG PO DANG, TSE DANG LDAN PA 'OD SRUNG CHEN
PO DANG, TSE DANG LDAN PA GSUS PO CHE CHEN PO DANG, TSE DANG LDAN
PA K'A TYA YA NA'I BU CHEN PO DANG, TSE

DANG LDAN PA KUN DGA' BO DANG, DGE SLONG LHAG MA DE DAG DANG,
THAMS CAD DANG LDAN PA'I 'KHOR DE DAG DANG, LHA DANG, MI DANG,
LHA MA YIN DANG, DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN

YI RANGS TE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO,
,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA KHRI PA LAS, MJUG
SDUD KYI LE'U ZHES BYA STE SUM
